subject: Re: clarification
author: psi_research
full_text:
Sometimes I'll sign as Bill M just for clarification.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Hiya Willy (hehe I like that)
>    
>   You are right there are alot of Bills around here LOL
>    
>   I did actually get to listen to some of your desert files when 
you posted them but I had to leave for work so didnt get a chance to 
do anything at the time. I will give you a rundown of them all here 
with any differences or changes I hear in *asterisks*
>    
>   AndAmazinglyRicksHotIdea*Help* (same but I hear that additional 
word on end)
> ButYouCalledToUs*It's Better* (")
> CheckThis*GroupEnergyWhatDoTheyTalkToAtNight* (several differences)
> EachDifferentWavelengthMoves*InUsToSync* (same but additional words 
on end)
> *WhatWeSee*ThatWasASpacecraft (I hear that as a multilayer. I hear 
what you hear with that other voice on top at start)
> ThereAreNoEntities*Ivebeensenttoearthtobeginthedeparted* (etcetera)
>   
>  I will try and get back to you on more and some of the other set. 
Just tired now, its been a long work day. Great stuff tho keep it up. 
Glad they answered some of your questions for you. Ive seen quite a 
bit of strangeness over the years. And I know what its like to have 
those around you living in thier own bubble worlds...but just 
remember they think the same about us hehehe. Who's bubble is better? 
>    
>   Can definitely say its all very interesting! And I enjoy bursting 
my own bubble now and then but never touch thiers =) We cant change 
anyone, except ourselves. They have to change themselves on thier 
own. But we can try to share, for those who seek to learn.
>    
>   Misty
>   
> billliscomb <williscomb@...> wrote:
>           OK, so maybe I went over the top yesterday describing my 
laptop 
> setup and how I use it  sorry. I did post a bunch of EVPs 
> under "Laptop EVPs" in the files. What I didn't make clear is that 
I'd 
> really appreciate some comments/critiques/suggestions on what I've 
> done. I've gotten a lot of stuff and would really like to run it by 
> someone else. I asked my wife, and she got a blank look, blinked 
> twice, turned and walked away. My teenage son listened to one clip 
> twice, heard what I did, then had more important stuff to do. So, 
it 
> would be nice to get some feedback on what I've done so far.
> I've read that "lower entities" come across more on EVPmaker, but 
so 
> far I haven't had any rude experiences  yet. Two days ago I forgot 
to 
> start the sessions with protection prayer/rules of engagement, and 
> right away a Scottish voice said, "Aye, it smells in here." I've 
got 
> another folder worth of stuff to upload, but want to get some 
comments 
> about my previous files first..
> I've noticed two Bills here already, so to avoid confusion, I'll go 
by 
> Willy.
> Thanks
> Willy
> 
> 
> 
>                          
> 
> 
>
